SEARCH
Package com.cmput301w23t40.capturetheqr

Class DB

java.lang.Object
com.cmput301w23t40.capturetheqr.DB
public class DB extends Object
This class does all the database queries. Note that many of the query methods have callback parameters. If your function must be executed strictly after the queries, then you must put your function inside the callback functions created when you call the query methods. If the queries can be executed asynchronously then you can leave the callback blank, but be sure to write down a comment saying this blank is on purpose. Also, no matter whether you use the callback functions or not, you must create them. In other words, they cannot be null.

    • setDB

    • saveQRCodeInDB

      protected static void saveQRCodeInDB(QRCode qrCode, DB.Callback callback)
      This method only saves the hashValue, codeName, visualization and score. Comments and scanner's info will be added by other methods.
      Parameters:
      qrCode - qr code object to be added
      callback - actions to perform after the query is executed

    • saveCommentInDB

      protected static void saveCommentInDB(QRCode qrCode, QRCode.Comment comment, DB.Callback callback)
      Save a comment in DB, no verification is implemented since if the user has not scanned the code yet, the user cannot even see the button for commenting
      Parameters:
      qrCode - qrCode object to be commented on
      comment - comment object
      callback - actions to perform after the query is executed

    • verifyIfScannerInfoIsNew

      protected static void verifyIfScannerInfoIsNew(QRCode qrCode, QRCode.ScannerInfo scannerInfo, DB.CallbackVerifyIfScannerInfoIsNew callbackVerifyIfScannerInfoIsNew)
      Verify if the scanner is new to this code
      Parameters:
      qrCode - qr code object
      scannerInfo - scanner info object
      callbackVerifyIfScannerInfoIsNew - actions to perform after the query is executed

      Parameters:
      qrCode - qr code object
      scannerInfo - scanner info to be saved

    • deleteScannerFromQRCode

      public static void deleteScannerFromQRCode(String hashValue, String username, DB.Callback callback)
      Delete scanner info from the qr code, and update related fields
      Parameters:
      hashValue - hash value of the qr code
      username - username of the scanner
      callback - actions to perform after the query is executed

    • addNewPlayer

      protected static void addNewPlayer(Player player, DB.CallbackAddNewPlayer cbplayerExists)
      This method adds a new player to the DB. Since it is only called when an account is being generated, error checking is also done to make sure the user does not already exist
      Parameters:
      player - the new player to add
      cbplayerExists - a call back to pass back to main describing if the player exists

    • verifyIfDeviceIDIsNew

      public static void verifyIfDeviceIDIsNew(String deviceID, DB.CallbackVerifyIfDeviceIDIsNew callbackVerifyIfDeviceIDIsNew)
      Verify if deviceID is new
      Parameters:
      deviceID - deviceID of the device that is being used
      callbackVerifyIfDeviceIDIsNew - actions to perform after the query is executed

      callbackGetPlayer - actions to be performed after the query is executed

    • searchForPlayer

      protected static void searchForPlayer(String username, DB.CallbackGetPlayer callbackGetPlayer)

    • saveImageInDB

      protected static void saveImageInDB(String username, String hash, android.graphics.Bitmap bmap, DB.Callback cb)
      This function will save an image (in the form of a bitmap) to a users account
      Parameters:
      username - the user to save the image to
      hash - the hash value of the qr (ie. the id of the document in the DB)
      bmap - the bitmap of the image
      cb - a basic callback showing completion
